localize.title: 我的产品就是我的花园
我的產品就是我的花園

previous.excerpt:
Yeah that’s right, I fucking said it.

I’ve noticed the FUD campaign has been shifting lately, It’s shifted towards
calling al you retards actually retarded for buying GME at it’s height. While
yeah, buying high and selling low is actually retarded, I am not disputing that.

But what I’ve noticed is…
previous.title: Daily reminder that buying GME at 300 before 28/1 was a great play at the time.

localize.title: 每日提醒，28/1之前在300买入GME是当时的好戏。

但我注意到的是... ...
